text: Va [ej mu'minon] harci dar tavon dored, az neru va asphoi omoda [va cangafzor], ʙasic kuned, to ʙo in [tadorukot] dusmani Alloh taolo va dusmani xesro ʙitarsoned, hamcunin, [ʙo in tachizot dusmanoni] digarero ƣajr az eson, ki sumo ononro namesinosed, va [-le] Alloh taolo mesinosadason [ʙa vahsat ʙijandozed] va harci dar rohi Alloh taolo infoq kuned, podosi on ʙa sumo ʙozgardonda mesavad va ʙar sumo sitam nameravad
